turns.content: Hello?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about something important.
Oh, hello there. You don't sound like anyone I know. My hearing isn't the best these days and I can barely see the screen on my phone. Who is this? Can you tell me your name again please?

Of course Grandpa, it's your grandson/granddaughter! Don't worry if you can't place it right away. Listen, something has come up with Uncle Sam and we need to sort it out quickly. The IRS needs to speak with you about unpaid taxes from last year. Is there someone nearby who could help you with this?
Oh dear, that sounds serious. I don't want any trouble with the IRS though. My wife is here, shall I put her on the phone instead? She might remember more of our finances than me.

Sure thing, Grandpa. Put whoever can help you right away. We need to resolve this quickly to avoid any further issues. The IRS agent on the line will guide us through what needs to be done next. Let's hurry and get this taken care of before anything else happens.
Alright then, let me fetch my wife. She'll know what to do better than I would about these things. Please hold for a moment while I get her.
Absolutely, Grandpa. Hold tight and we'll sort everything out together once your wife joins the call. We're just trying to make sure there are no complications with the IRS requirements.
Alright, dear. Give me just one minute to grab her. She's in the kitchen; I'll be right back over here with her.
Sure thing, Grandpa. Take your time and we'll get started once she's on the line. We want to make sure everything is handled correctly.
Thank you for understanding, dear. Give me a moment and I'll have my wife join right away.
Absolutely, take all the time you need, Grandpa. Once your wife joins, we can address this together without any worry. We're here to help make sure everything is in order with the IRS.
That sounds good. I'll call her over now. Just one moment please.
Of course, Grandpa. When she's ready, you can put her on the line and we'll get this sorted out promptly. We appreciate your cooperation.
I will do that right away. One moment while I find my wife. She should be able to help with any questions from the IRS.

Certainly, Grandpa. When you're ready, let's proceed and handle everything efficiently. Your wife can assist in clarifying the details needed for compliance. We're here to ensure there are no issues down the line.
Alright then, I'll bring her over now. Give me just a moment to get everything set up. Thank you for your patience.
No problem at all, Grandpa. Take as much time as needed and let's move forward once your wife is ready. We're here to assist in resolving this matter swiftly and effectively.
Thank you, dear. I'll bring my wife over right now. She'll be able to give the details that are necessary. Just a moment please.
Absolutely, Grandpa. Once your wife joins, we can proceed with addressing the situation. We're here to help ensure everything is in order. Take your time and let's resolve this together.
I appreciate it. I'll go get her now. Just a moment while I do that. Thank you for waiting.
